attributes.action: Be more pro-active with potholes/Dangerous paths around Oxfordshire(Bicester).
attributes.additional_details: Also Speed Bumps Down Middleton Stoney Road again with Pot holes that are really bad. (Costing the Public Thousands of money with repairs to there vehicles.)
attributes.background: Old estates such as kings end (street: Ashby Road)The potholes are ridiculous they have been filled in so many times yet they seem to be getting worse.Path between The Bicester School and the allotments is dangerous, Not to mention its very hard to push a pushchair/wheelchair down it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads and paths is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
